name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software development, specializing in designing and building AI-driven solutions and distributed systems. Proficient in **Python**, with hands-on expertise in developing applications using advanced technologies and frameworks, including **Go**, **C**, and **C++**. Adept at using **container runtimes** and **microVMs** for effective application deployment and sandboxing.
Experienced in leveraging **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for developing high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Skilled in implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines to enhance software delivery processes.
Strong background in AI/ML, with a focus on predictive analytics and automation. Expertise in MLOps tools, including **MLflow** and **Airflow**, for model training and orchestration. Dedicated to compliance and quality, aligning development practices with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
